TaxonIdentification.subspecies_name: 扁囊薹草 ( 原亚种) bian nang tai cao (yuan ya zhong)

TaxonIdentification.variety_authority: (Fischer & C. A. Meyer ex Kunth) Kükenthal.

treatment.description: Female glumes ovate or ovate-oblong, apex acute.
treatment.distribution: Wet grasslands on riverbanks, boggy meadows, slopes; 700–3500 m. Gansu, Heilongjiang, Nei Mongol, Qinghai, Shanxi [Mongolia, Russia (Siberia)].
